hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas and Ibn 'Umar, who attributed the Hadith to the Prophet (ﷺ) that he said:“It is not permissible for a man to give a gift then take it back, except what a father gives to his child.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَعْطَى وَلَدَهُ ثُمَّ رَجَعَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Gives His Child A Gift Then Takes It Back
